remarks: Lemma for ~ stoweid : if ` A ` is positive and all ` M ` terms of a finite product are larger than ` A ` , then the finite product is larger than A^M. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
stoweidlem3.1 $e |- F/_ i F $.
stoweidlem3.2 $e |- F/ i ph $.
stoweidlem3.3 $e |- X = seq 1 ( x. , F ) $.
stoweidlem3.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
stoweidlem3.5 $e |- ( ph -> F : ( 1 ... M ) --> RR ) $.
stoweidlem3.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 1 ... M ) ) -> A < ( F ` i ) ) $.
stoweidlem3.7 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
stoweidlem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^ M ) < ( X ` M ) ) $.
$d A i $.
$d M i $.
